spec.description:
Use this board to receive project requests via a form and manage the project approval process. 

How it works: once the form is submitted, it will populate in the 'New requests' group. Once approved, a new item will be created in the 'Portfolio Management' board, which is linked to the project request.

columns.title: Initiator
columns.description: The person who submitted the form

columns.title: Request Status
columns.description: The status of the project request. When the status is changed, the request will automatically move to the correct group using automations

columns.title: Request Date
columns.description: The date that the project was requested on. This is automatically populated using an automation

columns.title: Executive summary
columns.description: This information is automatically populated when the form is filled out

columns.title: Anticipated Outcomes
columns.description: This information is automatically populated when the form is filled out

columns.title: Recommendation
columns.description: This information is automatically populated when the form is filled out

columns.title: Approved Budget
columns.description: Add your project approved budget. You can change the currency from the column settings
